channel.title: Flask on 工程師的呢喃
channel.description: Recent content in Flask on 工程師的呢喃

item.title: Flask 連結 PostgreSQL
item.description: Create First Flask web app Flask Tutorial from flask import Flask app = Flask(__name__) app.config["DEBUG"] = True @app.route('/') def home(): return "<h1>Hello Flask!</h1>" if __name__ == '__main__': app.run() Database Configure 安裝PostgreSQL套件psycopg2-binary pip install psycopg2-binary 安裝套件flas
